section.title: Basic tasks
section.para: The procedures listed in may return the following errors:

note.title: ***Design Note***
note.para: Itemize according to the "Basic" tasks - not related to any specific concept discussed in the Concepts section. Perhaps chunk this down into individual sections depending on the extent of the content - for Context Sensitive Help.
It is unlikely that basic tasks will have any associated error or warning messages so this "Basic tasks" section could be ommitted.

listitem.para: An attempt was made to do things incorrectly which resulted in the error.
Perform this action to rectify the error
